
# Random Mob Sizes
[![GitHub](https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/Stoupy51/RandomMobSizes?logo=github&label=GitHub)](https://github.com/Stoupy51/RandomMobSizes/releases/latest)
[![Smithed](https://img.shields.io/badge/dynamic/json?url=https%3A%2F%2Fapi.smithed.dev%2Fv2%2Fpacks%2Frandom-mob-sizes-dp%2Fmeta&query=%24.stats.downloads.total&logo=data%3Aimage%2Fsvg%2Bxml%3Bbase64%%3D%3D&logoColor=224bbb&label=Smithed&labelColor=black&color=224bbb)](https://smithed.net/packs/random-mob-sizes-dp)
[![Modrinth](https://img.shields.io/modrinth/dt/random-mob-sizes-dp?logo=modrinth&label=Modrinth)](https://modrinth.com/datapack/random-mob-sizes-dp)
[![Discord](https://img.shields.io/discord/1216400498488377467?label=Discord&logo=discord)](https://discord.gg/anxzu6rA9F)

This datapack provides a funny game experience by randomizing every mob sizes in your world! üé≤ üéÆ<br>
The default scale is 0.25-4.0 but can be configured as you want with the command `/function random_mob_sizes:config` ‚öôÔ∏è

The datapack is optimized, meaning it do not add any lag to your world/server! ‚ö°Ô∏è

## Technical / Compatibility üîß
Mobs concerned by the datapack are:
- mobs with a "Brain" NBT üß†
- not players üë§
- not armor stands üõ°Ô∏è
- not entities having the following Tags: `random_mob_sizes.checked`, `smithed.entity`, `smithed.strict`, `global.ignore` üè∑Ô∏è

Meaning modded mobs can be concerned! üéØ

![Random Mob Sizes Image](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/aKeMRgHX/images/b432d5ac8d584e58d88c735b85ca5c384bb7a877.png)
